name: Not-So-Fun-Game!
description:
This is just a really small project, I was working on cuz' I wanted to take a break from working on my other game 'ThreeD' , so I made this. All controls can be found in the in-game menu....and ummmmmmmm....yeah....please play thanks! :)

(also this will probably not receive any updates or so, becuz imma go back to working on ma 3d game soon.......sooooo this is the final peoduct?)
